[B]0.3.5[/B] (2020-02-06) - (axbmcuser) Added optional python 3 compatibility

[B]0.1.6[/B] - Enable context menu/info
[B]0.1.5[/B] - Fix circular reference warnings on shutdown.

[B]0.0.8[/B] - Add favorite episodes - thx SumnerH.
[B]0.0.7[/B] - Add support to return multiple types in single list
